---
title: "Week 6: Exponential smoothing"
---

::: {.cell}

:::


## What you will learn this week

* Exponential smoothing methods with trend and seasonality
* ETS models
* Automatic model selection using the AICc

## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial)

Complete Exercises 1-4, 16, 17 from [Section 8.8](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth-exercises.html)

## Pre-seminar activities

Read [Chapter 8 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth.html) and watch all embedded videos






## Assignments

* [GA2](../assignments/G2.qmd) is due on Wednesday 10 April.
* [IA3](../assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Wednesday 24 April.
